DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study evaluate safety tolerability single intradermal administration RXI-109 small surgical incision abdominal skin later remove elective abdominoplasty . The effect RXI-109 versus placebo scar incision site evaluate visually histologically .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Safety , Pharmacokinetics , Preliminary Effect Scar Formation RXI-109
DOC.criteria: Subject must female general good health normal screen value Subject must good surgical candidate elective abdominoplasty Subjects must pregnant lactate utilize effective method contraception ( childbearing potential exists ) Currently pregnant lactate BMI great 35 screening Use tobacco nicotinecontaining product within month prior enrollment study Any medical condition current therapy would make subject unsuitable study opinion PI
